content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Copper plate factory
No structures found for copper plate factory

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the chest is not full before extracting items
- Make sure to have enough items to extract in the source entity
- Check if the entity from which you are extracting items has the required items

### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full to continue mining
- Make sure to have enough coal in the inventory to fuel the burner mining drills

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure the boiler has enough fuel to operate
- Check the connections of the boiler to ensure it is properly connected to the steam engine

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure the steam engine has a fluid input connection
- Check the connections of the steam engine to ensure it is properly connected to the boiler and the power grid
